Package User

Class RegisteredUser

  • java.lang.Object
    • User.RegisteredUser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class RegisteredUser
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class implements a registered user who has a unique id, name, surname, password and credit card. He also has a list of bought and created offers, and a list of created houses.
    Author:
    Javier Delgado del Cerro, Javier Lopez Cano
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • RegisteredUser

        public RegisteredUser(java.lang.String id,
                      java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String surname,
                      java.lang.String creditCard,
                      java.lang.String password,
                      UserType type)
        Constructor of the RegisteredUser class.
        Parameters:
        id - int with the unique id of the user.
        name - String with the user's name.
        surname - String with the user's name.
        creditCard - String with the user's credit card. It should have 16 digits to be well-formed and avoid exceptions.
        password - String with the user's password.
        type - UserType that determines if it is a host, guest or both.

    • Method Detail

      • getCreditCard

        public java.lang.String getCreditCard()
        Getter of the user's credit card used to pay the offers.
        Returns:
        String with user's credit card

      • getId

        public java.lang.String getId()
        Getter of the user's id used to log in.
        Returns:
        String with the user's id.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Getter of the user's name used to print his information on comments, for example.
        Returns:
        String with the user's name.

      • getPassword

        public java.lang.String getPassword()
        Getter of the user's password used to log in.
        Returns:
        String with the user's password.

      • getType

        public UserType getType()
        Getter of the user's type, which can be HOST, GUEST or BOTH.
        Returns:
        UserType with the user's type.

      • getStatus

        public int getStatus()
        Getter of the user's status used determine if he is logged in, banned, etc.
        Returns:
        int with the user's status.

      • getCreatedHouses

        public java.util.List<House> getCreatedHouses()
        Getter of the list of houses the user has created, Used to represent those houses on the graphical user interface.
        Returns:
        List with the user's created houses.

      • changeCreditCard

        public void changeCreditCard(java.lang.String creditCard)
        Change the credit card of a user in order to un-ban it. If the user has debt money, we pay it to him. We suppose that the credit card is not going to be wrong twice.
        Parameters:
        creditCard - The user new credit card

      • changeStatus

        public void changeStatus(int status)
        Sets the user status in order to log in, log out or be banned.
        Parameters:
        status - The status the user will have once the method is called.

      • seeOffers

        public java.util.List<Offer> seeOffers()
        Returns the entire list of offers a host has created. Used to show those offers on the graphical user interface.
        Returns:
        List with the user's created offers.

      • seeHistory

        public java.util.List<Offer> seeHistory()
        Returns the entire list of offers a guest has reserved/bought. Used to show those offers on the graphical user interface.
        Returns:
        List with the user's reserved/bought offers.

      • sumDebtMoney

        public void sumDebtMoney(double m)
        Add money to the sum of user's debt money. If the host credit card is not valid, the money we should pay him is stored on this variable.
        Parameters:
        m - double to sum on the user's debt money.

      • addOffer

        public boolean addOffer(Offer o,
                        int s)
        Adds an offer to a user's created or reserved/bought offers list, depending on the value of s.
        Parameters:
        o - The offer to be added.
        s - int that can be CREATE_OFFER (the offer is a created offer), or HIST_OFFER (the offer is a reserved/bought offer).
        Returns:
        boolean true if it has been added or false if it was already added.

      • removeOffer

        public boolean removeOffer(Offer o,
                           int s)
        Removes an offer from a user's created or reserved/bought offers list, depending on the value of s.
        Parameters:
        o - The offer to be removed.
        s - int that can be CREATE_OFFER (the offer is a created offer), or HIST_OFFER (the offer is a reserved/bought offer).
        Returns:
        boolean true if it was removed successfully or false if the offer wasn't in the list.

      • addHouse

        public boolean addHouse(House h)
        Adds a house to a user's houses list.
        Parameters:
        h - The House to be added.
        Returns:
        boolean true if the house was added successfully or false if was already in the list.

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns the RegisteredUser as a String so that it can be shown.
